abilities.name: Agile Combatant
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Supreme Commander
abilities.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your WARLORD.

abilities.name: Way of the Short Blade
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Puretide's Teachings
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Crisis Commander
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Enforcer Commander
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Volley Fire
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

abilities.name: Crack Shot
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

abilities.name: Coordinated Leadership
abilities.description: In your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Duality Shield
abilities.description: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save (4+)
abilities.description: Models in this unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Paradox of Duality
abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.

abilities.name: Inspirational Defiance
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Structural Analyser
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Jammer Array
abilities.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

abilities.name: Armour Hunter
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Suppression Volley
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.description:
In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next turn, its Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret weapon.

Designer’s Note: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.

choices.name: Pulse carbine + Pulse pistol + Close combat weapon
Pulse pistol + Close combat weapon + Pulse rifle

abilities.name: Breach and Clear
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.description:
In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next turn, its Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret weapon.

Designer’s Note: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.

abilities.name: Fieldcraft
abilities.description: At the end of the your Command phase, if this unit within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: Bodyguard
abilities.description: If this unit has a Starting Strength of 20, you can attach up to two Leader units to it instead of one, provided those Leaders are not duplicates (e.g. you cannot attach two WAR SHAPERS to this unit). If you do, and this unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with their original Starting Strengths.

abilities.name: Kroot Packmates
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent's Shooting phase, when a friendly KROOT INFANTRY unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, that unit with this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

choices.name: Krootox fists + Repeater cannon + Close combat weapon
Krootox fists + Tanglecannon + Close combat weapon

abilities.name: Turbo-jets
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Crisis Bodyguard
abilities.description: If a CHARACTER unit from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a CRISIS FIREKNIFE BATTLESUIT unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.

abilities.name: Forward Observers
abilities.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in a Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Stealth Drones
abilities.description:
Twice per battle, after an attack has been allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

Designer’s Note: Place two Stealth Drone tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used.

abilities.name: Precise Targeting
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Spotted unit, you can re‑roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Target Uploaded
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and that attack has the **[IGNORES COVER]** ability.

choices.name: Pulse carbine + Semi-automatic grenade launcher + Pulse pistol + Close combat weapon

abilities.name: Piranha
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Airborne Agility
abilities.description: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Loping Pounce
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, if this unit is within 6" of one or more friendly KROOT INFANTRY units, then until the end of the turn, this unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Hunting Hounds
abilities.description: While this unit is within 12" of one or more friendly KROOT CHARACTER models, the Objective Control characteristic of models in this unit is 1.

abilities.name: Armour Hunter
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Velocity Tracker
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack with a ranged weapon that targets a unit that can FLY, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Rapid Deployment
abilities.description: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

abilities.name: Ground Strike Fighter
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that cannot FLY, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Pulse Bombs
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Droneport
abilities.description: Each time this FORTIFICATION is selected to shoot, its drone defenders weapon will target and resolve attacks against every enemy unit that is an eligible target to this FORTIFICATION.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, subtract 3 from this models Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Heavy Walker
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

abilities.name: Support System
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Titan-killer
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a TITANIC or TOWERING unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

choices.name: Farstalker firearm + Kroot pistol + Close combat weapon
Kroot pistol + Farstalker firearm + Close combat weapon

abilities.name: Nova Shielding
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model is selected as the target of a ranged attack, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets this model, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this model, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Nova Burst
abilities.description: Once per battle, before this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, it has a Move characteristic of 18".

abilities.name: High-intensity Markerlights
abilities.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a model in its Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Aerial Disengagement
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

abilities.name: Coordinated Strike
abilities.description: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-10 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Agile Dogfighter
abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Strafing Run
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that cannot FLY. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Aggressive Deployment
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Air Caste Colossus
abilities.description: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem, you must spend three times that Stratagem’s stated CP cost to do so.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-20 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-20 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Jet Pack Insertion
abilities.description: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase, one or more units embarked within this TRANSPORT can disembark from it, provided every model in each of those disembarking units has the Deep Strike ability.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-9 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-9 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Drone Escort
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a friendly T'AU EMPIRE unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, the unit using this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

abilities.name: Loping Stride
abilities.description: Each time this model Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.

abilities.name: Outflank
abilities.description: When this unit arrives from Strategic Reserves, it can be set up within your opponent’s deployment zone (all other restrictions still apply).

weapons.name: ➤ Experimental pulse submunitions rifle - ionic cluster-beam shell

abilities.name: Eclipse Field Generator
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Assassin
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Photon Casters
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if an enemy INFANTRY unit was hit by one or more of those attacks, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Orbital Comms Array (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T'AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this FORTIFICATION, each time you target that unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Reinforced Cover
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Reinforced Cover
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this FORTIFICATION, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: Sentinel Protocols
abilities.description: Each time you select this FORTIFICATION for the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ when resolving that Stratagem.

abilities.name: Sunforge
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a **^^Monster^^** or **^^Vehicle^^** unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.

abilities.name: Invulnerable Save (4+)
abilities.description: This unit has a 4+ Invulnerable Save

abilities.name: Fireknife
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is at its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

abilities.name: Weapon Support System
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Starscythe
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack (excluding attacks that target MONSTERS and VEHICLES), improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.description: The unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Kroot Ambush
abilities.description: After both players have deployed their armies, you can redeploy this model's unit and one other friendly KROOT unit. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Trail Finding
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model's unit, if this model's unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

abilities.name: Root of Honour
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly KROOT unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: War Leader
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Fire and Fade
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Advanced Scouting
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that hits an enemy unit, until the end of the turn, each time another KROOT model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Kroot Linebreakers
abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of these mortal wounds, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

for_the_greater_good.name: For the Greater Good
for_the_greater_good.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one or more units from your army to be Observers. Each Observer unit can select one enemy unit visible to it to be their Spotted unit. Other friendly T'AU EMPIRE units become Guided when targeting that Spotted unit, gaining +1 to hit rolls. If the Observer has the MARKERLIGHT keyword, Guided units also gain [IGNORES COVER] when targeting the Spotted unit. An Observer unit that targets any unit other than its Spotted unit gets -1 to hit rolls.

rules.name: Patient Hunter
rules.description: During the third, fourth and fifth battle rounds, ranged weapons equipped by T'AU EMPIRE models from your army have [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. In addition, during those battle rounds, each time a Guided T'AU EMPIRE model makes a ranged attack that targets a Spotted unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll and Ballistic Skill characteristic.

stratagems.name: A Tempting Trap
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE unit and one objective marker. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack against an enemy unit within range of that objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. Only available in battle rounds 3-5.

stratagems.name: Point-Blank Ambush
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army. Until the end of the phase, improve the AP of ranged attacks by 1 if the target is within 9". Only available in battle rounds 3-5.

stratagems.name: Coordinate to Engage
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army that is a Guided unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack against the Spotted unit, add 1 to the Hit roll, and if the Observer has MARKERLIGHT, those attacks gain [IGNORES COVER].

stratagems.name: Combat Embarkation
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Charge phase, after an enemy unit declares a charge. Select one T'AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit from your army that is a target of that charge and within 3" of a friendly T'AU EMPIRE TRANSPORT. That unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.

stratagems.name: Photon Grenades
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Charge phase, when an enemy unit declares a charge against a T'AU EMPIRE GRENADES unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. In addition, subtract 2 from the Charge roll made for that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: Wall of Mirrors
stratagems.description: Use at the end of your opponent's Fight phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE STEALTH, GHOSTKEEL or COMMANDER SHADOWSUN unit from your army not within Engagement Range of any enemy units. Remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Exemplar of the Kauyon
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. The Patient Hunter detachment rule takes effect from battle round 2 instead of battle round 3.

enhancements.name: Precision of the Patient Hunter
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. From battle round 3 onwards, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

enhancements.name: Solid-image Projection Unit
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. After both players have deployed their armies, you can redeploy up to three T'AU EMPIRE units from your army. Those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves regardless of how many units are already in Reserves.

enhancements.name: Through Unity, Devastation
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. While the bearer is an Observer, each time a friendly Guided T'AU EMPIRE model makes a ranged attack against the bearer's Spotted unit, that attack has [LETHAL HITS].

rules.name: Killing Blow
rules.description: During the first, second and third battle rounds, ranged weapons equipped by T'AU EMPIRE models from your army have [ASSAULT]. In addition, during those battle rounds, each time a Guided T'AU EMPIRE model makes a ranged attack that targets a Spotted unit, that attack has [LETHAL HITS].

stratagems.name: Pinpoint Counter-Offensive
stratagems.description: Use in any phase, when an enemy unit destroys a T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army. Select one friendly T'AU EMPIRE unit. Until the end of the battle, each time a model in that unit makes an attack against that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Aggressive Mobility
stratagems.description: Use in your Movement phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army. That unit can Advance without rolling — instead, add 6" to its Move characteristic for this phase.

stratagems.name: Focused Fire
stratagems.description: Use at the start of your Shooting phase. Select two T'AU EMPIRE units from your army. Until the end of the phase, those units can only target one enemy unit but improve the AP of their ranged attacks by 1. Cannot be used in battle rounds 4 or 5.

stratagems.name: Combat Debarkation
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE INFANTRY unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack against the closest enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Pulse Onslaught
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase, after a T'AU EMPIRE unit has shot. Select one enemy unit hit by those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, subtract 2 from that enemy unit's Move and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

stratagems.name: Counterfire Defence Systems
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Shooting phase, when a T'AU EMPIRE unit from your army is selected as a target. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (to a minimum of 1).

enhancements.name: Coordinated Exploitation
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. While the bearer is an Observer, each time a friendly Guided T'AU EMPIRE model makes a ranged attack against the bearer's Spotted unit, that attack has [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

enhancements.name: Exemplar of the Mont'ka
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. The Killing Blow detachment rule also applies during battle round 4.

enhancements.name: Strategic Conqueror
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. At the start of the battle, select one objective marker. While the bearer is within range of that objective marker, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

enhancements.name: Strike Swiftly
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE CHARACTER model only. After both players have deployed, up to two friendly T'AU EMPIRE units within 6" of the bearer gain the Scouts 6" ability.

rules.name: Bonded Heroes
rules.description: Each time a T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT model from your army makes a ranged attack, if the target is within 12", improve the Strength of that attack by 1. If the target is within 9", improve the Armour Penetration of that attack by 1 as well.

stratagems.name: Fail-Safe Detonator
stratagems.description: Use in any phase, when a T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army is destroyed. If that unit has Deadly Demise, you can choose the result; otherwise, each unit within 6" must roll a D6, suffering D3 mortal wounds on a 4+.

stratagems.name: Stimm Injectors
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Shooting phase or Fight phase, when a T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army is selected as a target. Until the end of the phase, models in that unit have a 6+ Feel No Pain.

stratagems.name: The Shortened Blade
stratagems.description: Use in your Movement phase, when a T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit from your army arrives from Deep Strike. That unit can be set up anywhere that is more than 6" from enemy units. It cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: The Arro'kon Protocol
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit. Until the end of the phase, attacks against units with 6+ models gain [SUSTAINED HITS 1]; against units with 11+ models, gain [SUSTAINED HITS 2] instead.

stratagems.name: The Torchstar Gambit
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase, after a T'AU EMPIRE FLY BATTLESUIT unit has shot. That unit can make a Normal move if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units. It cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Grav-Inhibitor Field
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Charge phase, when an enemy unit declares a charge against a T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT unit. The charging unit must take a Battle-shock test; additionally roll a D6 for each model in the charging unit — for each 6, the charging unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

enhancements.name: Internal Grenade Racks
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT CHARACTER model only. The bearer gains the GRENADES keyword. Each time the bearer ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over and roll 6D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

enhancements.name: Prototype Weapon System
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT CHARACTER model only. Each time the bearer is selected to shoot, select one: all ranged attacks made by the bearer have [LETHAL HITS]; or all ranged attacks made by the bearer have [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

enhancements.name: Puretide Engram Neurochip
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT CHARACTER model only. Each time you use a Stratagem that targets the bearer's unit, roll a D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Starflare Ignition System
enhancements.description: T'AU EMPIRE BATTLESUIT CHARACTER model only. At the end of your opponent's turn, if the bearer is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

rules.name: Hunter's Instincts
rules.description: Each time a KROOT model from your army makes an attack against a target that is Below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each time a KROOT model makes an attack against a target that is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

rules.name: Skirmish Fighters
rules.description: KROOT models from your army have a 6+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks, and a 5+ invulnerable save against melee attacks.

stratagems.name: Join the Hunt
stratagems.description: Use in your Command phase. Select one destroyed KROOT INFANTRY or KROOT HOUNDS unit from your army. Add a new unit identical to the destroyed unit, at Starting Strength, and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: A Trap Well Laid
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting or Fight phase. Select one KROOT unit and one enemy unit. After your unit resolves attacks against that enemy, other KROOT models targeting that enemy this phase improve AP by 1.

stratagems.name: Seismic Destabilisers
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one KROOTOX RAMPAGERS unit and one enemy unit within 18" that is within or on a terrain feature. That terrain does not provide cover; add 1 to Wound rolls. If an attack hits, that enemy must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: Vespid Sting
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one VESPID STINGWINGS unit. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have [DEVASTATING WOUNDS].

stratagems.name: Pech's Wargear
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting or Fight phase. Select one KROOT unit. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons have [LANCE] and ranged weapons have [IGNORES COVER].

stratagems.name: Killing Feast
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase. Select one KROOT unit and one Below Half-strength enemy unit within Engagement Range. Each time a model makes a melee attack against that enemy, re-roll the Wound roll, and if it wounds, re-roll the Damage roll.

enhancements.name: Borthrod Gland
enhancements.description: KROOT FLESH SHAPER model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

enhancements.name: Kroothawk Flock
enhancements.description: KROOT CHARACTER model only. The bearer's unit's ranged weapons have [IGNORES COVER]. In addition, enemy units cannot set up Reinforcements within 12" of the bearer.

enhancements.name: Nomadic Hunter
enhancements.description: KROOT TRAIL SHAPER model only. Add 3" to the Move characteristic of the bearer's unit. In addition, ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer's unit have [ASSAULT].

enhancements.name: Root-carved Weapons
enhancements.description: KROOT WAR SHAPER model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, all weapons equipped by models in that unit have [PRECISION] and [DEVASTATING WOUNDS].

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

weaponKeywords.Assault: Can be shot after Advancing (at -1 to hit unless otherwise stated).
weaponKeywords.Heavy: Add 1 to Hit rolls if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this phase.
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire X: Each time the bearer shoots, increase attacks by X if target is within half range.
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can be shot even if the unit is within Engagement Range of enemy units.
weaponKeywords.Blast: Add 1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits X: Critical hits generate X additional hits.
weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic.
weaponKeywords.Indirect Fire: Can target units not visible to the bearer. If so, subtract 1 from Hit rolls and the target has the Benefit of Cover.
weaponKeywords.Ignores Cover: The target does not receive the Benefit of Cover against this attack.
weaponKeywords.Torrent: Automatically hits — do not make Hit rolls.
weaponKeywords.Melta X: If target is within half range, increase Damage by X.
weaponKeywords.Anti-X Y+: Improve AP by 1 and wound on Y+ against targets with keyword X.
weaponKeywords.Precision: If target is an Attached unit, on a 6 to wound, the attacking model can allocate the attack to a CHARACTER model in that unit.
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll a D6: on 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (CHARACTER) or is destroyed (non-CHARACTER).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: Add 1 to Hit rolls if bearer Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: Increase attacks by X if target is within half range.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: Add 1 attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, target gets Benefit of Cover.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not receive Benefit of Cover.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits generate X additional hits.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage.

weapon.name: Torrent
weapon.description: Automatically hits — do not make Hit rolls.

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: Increase Damage by X if target is within half range.

weapon.name: Anti-X Y+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on Y+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On wound roll of 6, allocate to CHARACTER in Attached unit.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving, roll D6: on 1, suffer 3 mortal wounds or destroyed.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: A leader model that can be attached to eligible units.

unit.name: Epic Hero
unit.description: A named character. Only one per army. Cannot take Enhancements.

unit.name: Fly
unit.description: Can move over models and terrain. Can move within Engagement Range of enemy models.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves and arrive from Reinforcements.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can be set up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from enemy models.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Can make a Normal move of up to X" before the first turn begins.

unit.name: Lone Operative
unit.description: Cannot be targeted unless within 12" of the firing unit.

unit.name: Stealth
unit.description: Subtract 1 from Hit rolls made against this unit when firing from more than 12".

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to eligible Bodyguard units.
